Key Match Events: Brennan Johnson tapped in a rebound to give Wales the lead
Harry Wilson scored a second goal for Wales
Logi Tomasson scored twice to draw Iceland level
Wales managed to hold on for a 2-2 draw
Post-Match Reflections: Craig Bellamy continued his unbeaten run as Wales boss
Wales' performance improved in the second half despite starting strongly
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match took place in Reykjavik under cold conditions
Substitutions and an intense press from Iceland turned the game around
